DOC.HEADLINE: FOR THE RECORD
DOC.TEXT: New judges -- A Jan . 11 article on new judges said that according to Justice_Department officials , Judge Martha A . Vasquez of New Mexico was the first Mexican-American woman appointed to the federal bench . In fact , U.S. District Judge Irma E . Gonzalez , whose parents were both Mexican , was appointed by President George_Bush and sits on the federal bench in San Diego .
